_comment: getEventListPaged -- aircraft market events (sales, accidents, for-sale listings, etc.)
notes: WARNING: evtype and evcategory enum values are strict
sending unrecognized enum values returns an ERROR inside responsestatus even when HTTP is 200
always call getEventCategories and getEventTypes first to populate valid enum values
use [] for evtype and evcategory to get all event types (safer than guessing enum strings)
leave aclist and modlist empty to search across all aircraft
